name: override_rig
description: What rig to use for the character
label: Rig
items: Do not add a rig, no matter what is said in the preset
Use the rig specified in the preset
Use the default rigify metarig. See the rigging panel for generating the final rigify rig
Use the default rigify metarig without toes. See the rigging panel for generating the final rigify rig
